org.springframework.boot.jta.bitronix

Class PoolingDataSourceBean.DirectXADataSource

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.boot.jta.bitronix.PoolingDataSourceBean.DirectXADataSource
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CommonDataSource, XADataSource
    Enclosing class:
    PoolingDataSourceBean

    public static class PoolingDataSourceBean.DirectXADataSource
extends Object
implements XADataSource
    A XADataSource implementation that delegates to the ThreadLocal PoolingDataSourceBean.
    See Also:
    PoolingDataSourceBean.setDataSource(XADataSource)
